DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect MgSO4 administration pharmacodynamics rocuronium patient 60 year age .
DOC.criteria: 60 year old ASA physical status IIII Scheduled elective oncologic head neck surgery Severe renal insufficiency ( calculated creatinine clearance < 30 ml/min ) Preoperatory serum magnesium value > 2.5 mEq/l Patients receive medication know affect neuromuscular function ( furosemide , aminoglycoside , anticonvulsivants , calcio channel blocker , litium , azatioprine , cyclofosfamide )
